reviewText: This is a cute DVD.  My son is a big fan of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, and I bought this to see some new episodes.  He enjoys it, but it doesn't hold his attention like the TV show does.  I'm not sure why...but he likes the show better.  I, on the other hand, think this DVD is cute and has fun songs.

We first saw this show on the Disney channel.  My son liked it so much we went looking for a DVD of the shows and would recommend this to other Moms wanting to share Mickey Mouse with their kids today.  There's a balance between things us children of the 70's would remember about the Mickey Mouse Club show and this for us to appreciate it, and it also is enjoyable and memorable for my three year old. It has a good amount of repetition that makes it easy for the show to become familiar to him.

My 2 year old LOVES Mickey Mouse Clubhouse but I was leary of buying a movie length version since most of the time it is too different from the show & my son usually won't like it. However, this is is similar enough that he really likes it.  This is one show that teaches while it entertains and the movie is the same way.

Thumbs up!

My 2 1/2 year old daughter is currently watching this video and she is riveted.  She loves the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse on tv, so I shouldn't be surprised.

I am really pissed off right now though.  The video was given to my daughter as a gift from her geat-aunt.  The box stated that the video is about a spring party.  Only problem--it's actually an Easter party and we are Jewish!  If I had known this I would never have allowed this video to be a gift for my daughter.  Maybe she will enjoy the Donald hiccups episode, but I will never show her the Easter episode again.

Usually Mickey Mouse Clubhouse is my 3 year-old daughter's FAVORITE show, but NOT this episode. This episode is extremely frightening for her to watch, because of Pete's malicious plan and the scary giant. I'm not sure why the folks at Disney thought this was a good plot premise for a show aimed at pre-schoolers? They had a great opportunity to do a cute Spring-themed show here and all they could come up with is this? The other episode on the disc (Donald's Hiccups) is amusing and she'll ask for that repeatedly. I'd say this DVD is for older Mickey fans (5 yrs +). For the younger fans, wait for the hiccup episode to show on Playhouse Disney and watch it there...save your money.

Once again, Disney has given mom's and dad's around the world an AMAZING Dvd that both entertains and educates our kids! My 2 year old LOVES Mickey Mouse Clubhouse. We put this DVD in for him one afternoon and he sat on the couch with my husband and watched the entire thing without moving (except for doing the actions of course)!

I would recommend it to anyone! I only wish there were more of these DVDs on the Market! (Thank goodness we have recorded other episodes with the DVR!)

My 6 month old son loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, so I decided to buy this DVD for him.  I know this story by heart now.  He loves this DVD, and I put it in when I need to take a shower or clean.  I never have to worry about him being bored.  He definitely is a Mickey Mouse addict!

This DVD features two episodes of the computer-animated "Mickey Mouse Clubhouse" television series. The first is an Easter special, Mickey's Great Clubhouse Hunt. In this double-length (49-minute) episode, when Mickey invites his friends over to celebrate the holiday, Pete seeks revenge when he is left out. There's a good song, "The Best Easter Party Ever." A second episode, "Donald Hiccups", finds the "duck with all the bad luck" unable to sing on Clarabelle Cow's TV show when he comes down with the spasms.

Both shows include the typical Playhouse Disney dose of basic arithmetic, decision-making, music and puzzles. Other characters appearing include Ludwig von Drake, Chip 'n Dale (briefly), even Willie the Giant from the classic cartoon "Mickey and the Beanstalk." There's nothing ground-breaking here, but if your preschooler likes the TV show this is a nice addition.

I don't normally write reviews, but was disappointed enough with this DVD to let other parents know.  My 4 year old LOVES Mickey and couldn't wait for this new DVD to come out.  We watched it as soon as we got it home, but by the end my daughter was in my lap in tears and really scared. She will usually watch DVD's over and over again, but not this one (even though she did like the episode about Donald's hiccups). I just wish I had known that Mickey's great adventure included him getting locked up by a mean giant and I could have saved some money and some tears.  I'm sure that a lot of kids will be fine with it, but if your kids have any fears of giants I would skip this DVD.
My 2 yr old love Mickey Mouse Clubhouse so I got him this for Christmas.  Very good dvd.  Shows kids lots of things to learn like working together, counting, shapes, colors.  Excellent for toddlers.

It was just as good, if not better, then I had expected! Would recommend to anyone needing a Disney DVD!

My daughter loves Mickey and the gang, so this is a nice thing to have if we travel so she can watch it in the car, or anywhere else to keep her entertained.

Since we do not have the Disney channel I purchased a few of these videos on amazon. My only grip is that there are only a handful of episodes on each disc. Some have more than others. My son does not seem to care about seeing the same episodes over and over, but my husband and I are beginning to go a little crazy.
What can I say except that my son loves all things Mickey Mouse clubhouse? Now I'm just writing this sentence to meet the requirements for a review :)

The baby is very much entertained with the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse DVD"S.  Needless to say, that makes me happy I bought it.

My son is a true Mickey Mouse Clubhouse fan! These movies will keep my one year old son's attention the entire time it is on!  He watched this on a 16 hour car ride and didn't complain about the length of the trip once!

Great episode that my 18 month old son loves.  He usually watches one or two Mickeys a day before I turn the TV off on him, and he gets a kick out of this episode in particular.  When I give him a choice of DVDs he almost always picks this one. Must be something about Mickey...

The reason I am posting a review is because I saw someone give it one star because the giant scared their kid.  All I have to say is to joke around with your child about the giant being silly.  There are other episodes where the giant is featured as well and it is known that he is a friendly giant.
My boys absolutely adore Mickey and are huge fans of this movie.  The song is catchy and my son loves it.

"Mickey's Great Clubhouse Hunt" is one of my son's favorite episodes, so I love having this one on DVD.  Several reviewers talk about the lack of other episodes, aside from Donald's Hiccups, and I also wish there was a little more, but I can live with it to have this one on DVD.

This DVD was purchased for my 2 year old grandson.  He just loves it!  I think he is attracted to how colorful and entertaining the stories are.  He also learns concepts like colors, numbers, shapes and sizes.  It is great!
Ordered this for my son who is 2 and he loves Mickey and all the class ic characters bbut I was not willing to pay the price in the store.  Got a great price here.
I bought this movie for my son. He loves it and wants to watch it all the time. This was a great product
This movie was a hit with a 1 - 2+ year old, & like the other Mickey Mouse Clubhouse movies I have, it is also little educational, too.
Our grand kids love these Mickey movies.

My Toddler loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, so was excited to find this.  Upon receiving however, you'll realize quickly upon assembly how poor the quality and how unbelievably flimsy it is.

The elevator requires enough force that an adult has to operate it, and the flag that attaches to the top either doesn't stay in place jamming the elevator...or pops out all together.  The slide barely stays attached for one or two treks down by one of the figures included.  The movable ear falls off if you even look at it wrong.  The lever to rotate Toodles barely works only ever giving 1 to half a rotation.  The searchlight doesn't hold its position and simply flops down if not being held, plus the dim light drains the watch batteries (not included) in a very short time.

I can't believe Disney put their name on this.

Very disappointed, and already returned.

Purchased as Christmas gift for 2 1/2 year-old.  He was very excited to open the toy and has played with it quite a bit.  A simple toy, but lots of opportunity for imaginative play with the Tootles cards.

My son hasn't even played with it yet - it was going to be a christmas gift from nana.  I decided to assemble it in advance and I'm glad I did since it won't stay together.  1.  One of the ears/balls on top of the clubhouse will not stay on. 2. the elevator will not go up with the flag on - no matter how you position the flag. 3. the silly slide barely attaches - it will surely fall off the 1st time he moves it.  This piece of crap is not worth $20 - little less the $59 retail price.  Too bad - I'm sure he would have loved it.
I purchased this for my grandaughter's 2nd birthday. She plays with it every day. Of course it doesn't hurt that she is a huge Mickey fan but it has been a huge hit. Seems very durable also.
This item only had two shows on it and it cost as much as a video with four shows on it. I was disappointed. It's also an older version, which I didn't realize when I purchased the item.
This is by far the biggest hit in terms of Mickey Mouse DVDs at our house. This is actually our second copy! Cute stories!
My daughter is 14 months old and loves Mickey Mouse.  So, while she can't understand what is going on, she does enjoy watching Mickey.

If your kids like Mickey Mouse Clubhouse this is perfect for them.  When I turn it on for my daughter she watches it to the end.
The first episode on the movie is about Springtime and egg hunting so if your family does not participate in this it might not work for you.
Other than that it is a terrific movie.
My son really enjoys MMCH and this is a good DVD.  The Clubhouse Hunt theme is Easter related.
My son likes this DVD, but I wouldn't have bought it had I known it was about Easter--would have been helpful info before buying!
We don't ever really get to watch Mickey Mouse clubhouse b/c we leave for work and daycare before it comes on in the week. So it is nice to have it so my 21 month old can watch it when he wants.

but I really don't like it! I gave this 4 stars because my about-to-turn 3 year-old really likes it. But me ... not so much. I find it really annoying - and I really don't mind the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse TV shows. But this one, UGH. It has the most obnoxious song that they sing throughout the "movie" that makes me cringe every time I hear it. "The Great Clubhouse Hunt" is a double-length episode set during Spring/Easter. Pete, jealous and upset that Mickey didn't invite him to his Easter Party, attempts to get rid of Mickey and have the Clubhouse to himself to lead. Mayhem ensues and the Clubhouse "floats" away. When Mickey returns (as a result of a fake-out from Pete) he must gather the pieces of the Clubhouse to put it back together. That annoying "springtime" song is sung as well. The episode glosses over Easter too - not really depicting anything that Easter is about, or what makes it fun. They have decorated eggs, a cake and try to have a party, but that's it. They don't talk about decorating eggs, the Easter bunny, or anything else that's "Easter" if that makes sense. Unlike Mickey's Halloween Treat (Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse) it doesn't give a good sense of what to look forward to in the holiday. The other episode is "Donald's Hiccups" which is repeated on the Disney Channel often. My son has seen this one a few times, so he was underwhelmed. But he still watched it - enraptured, of course. ;)
My 14 mos. old grand-daughter loved this. Her parents played it on their laptop on the flight back home after Christmas.

My one and two year old's can NOT get enough of this. I decided to order the dvd after renting it a month ago, when my daughter absolutely fell in love with Mickey. She kept pointing to herself and saying "Me Mickey" or "Miska, Mooska, Mickey Mouse!"....a toddler's version of that, anyway. So when the package arrived and I pulled it out she almost cried with excitment. Truly.

We watch it daily, have to have our Mickey fix. She's learned all of the characters names and it's helped her greatly with her counting.

But the big deal is that it keeps my son's attention. He's a typical little one year old and is much too busy to sit in front of the Tv for any length of time until I put this in. It's long enough to entertain them both while I get chores or cooking done, and I love that it's interactive.

Also, it's taught my daughter to say "Oh, boy!"....which is positively adorable!

Need Multi-zone in Kiwi land. 2 stories of longer length than usual.
Great 2 keep little kiwi's happy for enough time to cook dinner and write this review. :-)

We rented this video because we wanted to have something a little different around the house for my daughter to watch. Within one week, she watched this movie 11 times! She loves it! She watched it so often that she was able to pick up and understand the concept of finding the pieces of the clubhouse. She loved the interaction, the songs, and the story. Sadly, we had to take it back to the video store, but we will be purchasing it so that she can watch it whenever her little brain desires. I encourage parents to buy this DVD if only to see that smile on your little one's face!

If you like this show and your child is getting something out of it, I don't see why you shouldn't get it. I personally will not get it for two important reasons to me, my child is not getting any use out of it (As far as the educacional content, it has got very little to almost none, I have found blue's clues and sesame street to be far more effective and entertaining) But putting this aside, the show itself is not creative at all, it is reusing the same characters over and over again, I think is a complete fraud and against what Walt Disney stood for, which was originality and creativeness and artistic talent, which I want my children to learn.
I think the Disney company is all about money and no values at all. They take the Disney characters (that they did not create) and use them any old way, just because they have the copyrights to them, after all, the original artists are pretty much dead or retired. Plus, it is not like they have to do much work because it's all computarised. They do the littlest amount of work for the maximun amount of money they can charge, I think it is a mediocre show, which also is against what Walt Disney stood for.
But like I said at the beginning, if you enjoy it and want to buy it, then I don't see why you shouldn't (Everybody has the right to like or dislike anything they want)
For me, I am not watching it, or buying it out of principle.
The disc doesn't work in our DVDs and is heaps cheaper anyway in Target. Why Amazon lets you purchase it outside US is a mystery. I would return it for refund, but not worth the hassle.

Originally, we thought this was a Mickey Mouse clubhouse movie but it is 2 episodes of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse show.  One episode is extended length (approx. 45 min.).  My son watches the DVD over and over again.  Please be aware that these episodes are not original to the DVD as they have been aired a few times on the Disney channel.

I bought this video for my nephew who was getting ready to embark on a cross country drive.  This video kept him entertained for many hours of this drive.  It was not only entertaining, but educational.  It amazes me what he learned from this video, and he is only 2!  I highly recommend any of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse videos.

My daughter is two years old so she really doesn't pay attention for a long time to the tv i have purchased many kids dvds but none of them have intrested her so when i brought mickey mouse i would figure it would be the same way but it turned out she stayed still for the whole dvd and wanted to watch it again!!! i enjoy watching it with her and sing along the songs. good choice.

Our daughter, who is almost 2, is absolutely a Mickey fanatic.  We have to watch Mickey Mouse Clubhouse (thanks to a TiVO Season Pass) 3 to 4 times a day.  Needless to say, we were looking for some NEW episodes!  This one is so cute, and it lasts longer than the usual episode.  It kept her attention virtually the entire time.  And I actually enjoyed it too!

The DVD also has a bonus episode, "Donald's Hiccups", which was recently shown for the first time on the Disney Channel.  Since we've already seen that one several times too, it wasn't really a bonus for us, but it is one of the better episodes.

I felt like this was worth the money, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
Mickey Mouse Clubhouse is a big hit in our house.  Sometimes we miss it on Disney and then we watch our CD. If your child likes the TV show they will love this CD.

My son is absolutely obsessed with Mickey Mouse.  This DVD is cute and centers around the Easter holiday, as far as decorated eggs, things like that.  I would agree with some of the other reviews that they could have included more episodes on the DVD than just two for the price. That is my only reason for not giving it a full 5 stars. There is an episode about Donald getting the hicups which quickly spreads to everyone else and they have to use home remedies to get rid of the hicups so they can sing on Clarabell's TV show.  My son is 2 and sits through the entire 2 episodes.  All in all its a great DVD for your little one that can't get enough of Mickey Mouse.
Longer stories than the 30 minute show on Disney.  A good dose of Mickey and Friends!
My son has enjoyed watching this very much what is nice about the club house show is that it is inter active for the kids and they are learning as they are having fun.

I don't know what it is about this show on TV but my daughter can't get enough of it.  It is one of the only shows she will sit and watch start to finish without moving a muscle.  So for the show I have to give it 5 stars but this review is specific to this DVD.

It is a lot like the show with a few more songs it seems.  Both the episodes are great but my complaint is that you only get two.  There are some decent extras on this disc but my daughter is 2 and it's more about the show.  I have also had trouble playing this disc on my car DVD player which I'm sure is tied to Disney copy protection as other DVD's work fine.

Disney has something called fast play which seems like a great idea.  My impression of fast play would be put it in and it goes straight to the show.  Well it does that but not without playing several previews from other DVD's that are available.  This should be a selection off of the main menu and not force you to watch them on fast play.

The episodes are a half hour long so they could have easily fit at least two more episodes on the DVD for greater value.  A Doodlebops DVD gets four episodes on one DVD and costs 10 - 12 dollars.  This one puts two episodes on one and costs 15 - 22 dollars.  I can't help but feel like they are bilking me a little bit.  I found it at Target for 15.00 and it looks like you can get it used on Amazon for close to the same price.

All in all good DVD just too much for what you are getting.  If you can find it cheaper than retail or used I would definately purchase.

If your child likes Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, this is just like what is on in the mornings.  We just drove from Kansas City to Florida and back, and our son probably watched it 100 times and never got tired of it.  Watching it was the best he has been in the car for long drives.  I'm tired of it, but he loves it.

My son loves this Mickey Mouse Clubhouse adventures (there are two different adventures) He can watch them all day if we let him and he always wants to watch.  I recommend this Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Adventure.

I think it's important to have interactive movies for Children.

This one it's particulary intresting and Funny for everyone!

Filled with interactive fun and new music, Mickey's Great Clubhouse Hunt is an adventure you'll love again and again.

So now repeat: Meeska Mooska Mickey Mouse!
This is my grandaughter's first DVD and she loves it, even at 6 months!  She recognized the "new" Mickey right off from seeing him on the Disney Channel.  What a great deal from Amazon.com!!
My son is a Mickey Mouse addict! He gets completely mesmerized by the TV show and this DVD. I will admit it gets a bit tedious for adults but he loves it!
This is a great movie, My daughter sits through the whole thing.  We love it!
My 2yr old and 7 yr old loved this dvd.  All the wonderful colors and action kept them glued to the television.

My 3 year old is a huge fan of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, so it comes as no surprise that he adores this DVD.  The great thing about the show is that it also encourages participation from the child watching the show and I can frequently hear my son yelling out answers.  I would higly recommend it to those with small children.
Keeping with the theme of the Mickey Mouse Club shows it is very similar and very entertaining for my toddler.
my 3 yr old cant get enough of mickey mouse club house.  Better than dora

The only thing that I don't like about this is the fact that it's an Easter Party.  It's like watching a Christmas movie in the middle of summer, you know?  Anway it's great if your kids like the show but wishes it were longer than the tv episodes.  My son is 2 1/2 and he loves it.

My kids love this video, they still watch it several times a week.  Also, it's not completely irritating like some preschool videos.  If you like Mickey yourself you will enjoy watching this with your children.

Typical Mickey Mouse Clubhouse dvd. It's interactive in some parts so the child can participate. Colors are bright, graphics....cool!

My kids LOVE this dvd.
We lost our recording of this episode .. The only thing that settles my daughter.. Nowhere else had it but you can always count on Amazon to save the day!
A great Mickey adventure!
Our grandson who received this when he was an infant still watches it today and he is a toddler
My daughter is 14months old and absolutely loves MMCH!!!
Was my toddlers first mickey movie. Had to buy because he was obsessed with it during it's Easter showing on Disney junior. Has a catchy Easter song even I sing it
I bought this for a road trip and my kids loved it, they watched over and over again. This is the Easter Episode Mickey Mouse.
The wrong DVD was in the box.
Great buy! Was in good condition and made my daughter very happy!
Didn't work
My three year old loves this video. Came quickly.
